Description: Required Skills to be successful:-   Advanced Excel, Financial Modelling, and presentation skills -   Experience in financial planning including budgeting and forecasting, strategic plan etc.-   In depth knowledge of data analyses and managing business KPIs -   Knowledge of SAP FICO, SAP BPC, Reporting tools examples Tableau, Alteryx, Power BI-   Minimum experience of 5 years (CA, MBA Finance or ACCA)About the Team:The role will report to Sr. Finanical Controller and you will be working in a busy environment.What equips you for the role:Education: Chartered Accountant Minimum Experience and Knowledge: Automotive, financial services, rental and leasing industryJob-Specific/Technical Skills required to complete the tasks: Advanced Excel, Financial Modelling & SAPJob Details
